name: Lord Hero of House Remes

content: No one understands why local lowlife Lord Aden Remes suddenly acts like the upright knight he was meant to be. The truth is, Aden&#039s been possessed by Aden Albireo, the empire&#039s hero who died after defeating the villainous Underlord and facing betrayal by his closest friends. Now, Aden&#039s out to get revenge on those who killed him with the help of a few new allies and none other than the Underlord himself! Can Aden and his gang buckle down and power up?
